definition: the other day/a few days ago
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: This is from the reporter a few days ago that the Ministry of Health.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者日前從省衛生廳瞭解到的。

sentences.english: However, Lin Zengxian was moved to tears in a recent press conference.
sentences.chinese: 不過林增祥日前在記者會上激動落淚。

sentences.english: Have a regulatory capital adequacy ratio of 200 percent or higher for the half-year period immediately prior to the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 申請日前半年自有資本適足比率應達百分之二百以上。

sentences.english: But one group of statisticians begs to differ.
sentences.chinese: 而日前的一組統計學家卻有不同看法。

sentences.english: A few days before the election, I went down to New York for a long-planned fund-raiser.
sentences.chinese: 選舉日前幾天，我去紐約參加一個籌劃已久的籌款會。

sentences.english: China published a national education plan for the next decade.
sentences.chinese: 中國日前發佈了未來10年教育規劃綱要。

sentences.english: Addison Wong has been appointed as General Manager of Yue Shanghai Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 黃景康先生日前被任命爲上海麗悅酒店的總經理。

sentences.english: Recently, the cloud and county toys wisdom Park opening ceremony was held.
sentences.chinese: 日前，雲和縣玩具智慧園開業儀式被隆重舉行。

sentences.english: The China that held a few days ago IT cacique peak is met, li Yan grand such say.
sentences.chinese: 在日前舉行的中國IT領袖峯會，李彥宏這樣說道。

sentences.english: The Self-Study Examination Instruction Group of the National Higher Education Committee recently made a decision in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 自學考試指導委員會日前在北京作出決定。

sentences.english: This symposium is led by district quality supervision bureau and held by Sijiqing Street running.
sentences.chinese: 日前，江乾區電梯安全座談會議在四季青街道召開。

sentences.english: This is from the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance recently received information.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者日前從湖南省財政廳獲得的信息。

sentences.english: All applicants must submit their applications for financial aid no later than January 31.
sentences.chinese: 所有的申請人必須在1月31日前提交申請。

sentences.english: That's why the A shares market in Shanghai tanked today, too.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼日前上海的A股市場也出現了下跌。

sentences.english: The judge gave Sutherland until March 30 to complete his jail term.
sentences.chinese: 法官要求薩瑟蘭在明年3月30日前完成服刑。

sentences.english: Note: All time limit refers to the continuous time span before the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 本條所指年限均指申請之日前連續的年限。

definition: in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
to learn of sth/to find out/to get news
late last year/the end of last year
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media
near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
according to a report/It is reported that...
